item.title: Pvp zone
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3519 && absY < 3968 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10367){

Why do you have two locations if you only want to make lumbridge a pvp zone.

so make sure you are checking the cordinates diagonal from eachother so like this

A---------B
l l
l l
l l
C---------D

You can use Point A and Point D because they are diagonal from eachother to make a box, so say the X coordinate at point A is = 3000 and the Y coordinate is = 3300 and the X coordinate at point D is = 3050 and Y coordinate is 3320.

You always put the smaller x coordinate interger first.

So

POINT A’s XCooridnate is smaller than POINT D so you put POINT A’s first and POINT D’s second. Same thing for the Y Coordinates you put POINT A’s y coordinate first because it’s smaller than POINT D’s Y Coordinate.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
